page.description: Computes the two digit delivery code for UPC codes
page.syntax: DeliveryCode as C = DELIVERY_CODE(C address,C zipcode)

argument.name: zipcode
argument.description: The ZIP code of the address. Character

page.discussion: DELIVERY_CODE() returns the delivery point code for an address. Used for computing the string to code with the PostNet bar code font when printing envelopes.
page.example: ? delivery_code("36 Bigelow St", "01803") = "36" ? delivery_code("936 Bigelow St", "01803") = "36"
